title: Large-Scale Academic Library Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Academic information retrieval and understanding of basic library services
context.additional_context: Flexible learning schedules for working professionals and utilization of LMS-based collaborative tools

learning_goals: The academic library education program can be designed by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model
Customized educational content can be developed based on learner analysis data
A system can be established to design formative assessments and provide feedback in online environments
Interdisciplinary library education linked to curricula can be planned through collaboration with faculty from other departments

resources: LMS Platform (Video Conferencing, Quiz Module, Discussion Board)
Digital Resource Database Access Permissions for Libraries
Case Analysis Educational Videos from Academic Libraries

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
